messages.subject: Re: Okita action figure!+New NHK page
messages.msgSnippet: Well, I noticed the Kenshin paintable figure is from a merchant in Bangkok where (resin figures?) are an artform (contests etc)...what you do is take pics to
messages.messageBody:
Well, I noticed the Kenshin paintable figure is from a merchant in
Bangkok where (resin figures?) are an artform (contests etc)...what
you do is take pics to the store and they basically can build you
one...for a price (it takes time)...anyways we can always "convert"
Kenshin into Okita...paint on a uniform,etc ^_^
--------------------------------------------
They revised the page so you will not see silhouettes/shadows anymore
http://www3.nhk.or.jp/taiga/
At our Spy Division mailing list I uploaded a group pic of the cast w/
Jo Odagiri and beard (scanned from a book)

secretarytocapt3
still thinking about the "kinshin" punishment...

messages.subject: Re: Okita action figure!
messages.msgSnippet: oh, but the ones which you can paint will allow you to customize the uniform...e.g. Mibugishiden uniform color scheme (black+red)...ack, I used to post really
messages.messageBody:
oh, but the ones which you can paint will allow you to customize the
uniform...e.g. Mibugishiden uniform color scheme (black+red)...ack, I
used to post really good ebay links at rkdreams.com with these figures
you can assembled+paint (ofcourse if have unsteady hands you may want
to settle for the plastic figures)...they are unofficial but very good
quality and beautiful...some are ~almost~ a foot high

secretarytocapt3
member of the SHQ Live Journal Community
http://www.livejournal.com/users/demonscircular/
